name: Thanh Vinh Nguyen
about: I am a hardworking first-year computer science student with a passion for programming and discovering, as well as a great attention to detail and a continuing pursuit for perfection. Having been writing programs and designing embedded systems as a hobby from a young age, I gained a variety of knowledge and experience in the field, and I am confident in my ability to apply them into more sophisticated projects. I am always seeking new challenges to overcome and gain more experience from.

education.title: National High School Graduation Certificate (Vietnam)
education.subtitle: Chu Van An National High School, Hanoi
points: Achieved First Prize at 2022-2023 Hanoi Physics Olympiad

projects.title: Wireless PlayStation 2 controller alternative
projects.subtitle: Investigation for the 2023 Vietnam Robotics Challenge
points: Aimed to rectify reliability issues present in available controllers
Developed a paired transmitter and receiver operating on the sub-GHz and 2.4GHz bands

Implemented alternate functions for ease of use
